turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I could really use a coffee to perk me up this afternoon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you the coffee from today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks is the closest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks? They're everywhere these days.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Red Mill Commons 1169 Nimmo Parkway in Virginia Beach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I know that one.  What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you do the online ordering so it's ready to pick up when you get there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! I use online ordering a lot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. I liked that new drink I had last week. Do you remember the name of it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Cordusio?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you'd like one grande Cordusio, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One second thought, make it a Venti. And I'd like it with 2%milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. A Venti Cordusio made with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just placed your order online. I am on my way to the Red Mill Store to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. You're the best!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Your receipt will be sent via text on your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!
